colour_hdri.read_dng_files_exif_tags¶

colour_hdri.read_dng_files_exif_tags(dng_files, exif_tags_binding=CaseInsensitiveMapping({u'EXIF': CaseInsensitiveMapping({u'Active Area': (<function <lambda>>, None), u'Make': (<function parse_exif_string>, None), u'Baseline Exposure': (<function <lambda>>, None), u'Profile Calibration Sig': (<function parse_exif_string>, None), u'ISO': (<function parse_exif_numeric>, None), u'White Level': (<function <lambda>>, None), u'Camera Calibration 1': (<function <lambda>>, u'1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1'), u'F Number': (<function parse_exif_numeric>, None), u'Camera Calibration 2': (<function <lambda>>, u'1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1'), u'Black Level': (<function <lambda>>, None), u'Samples Per Pixel': (<function <lambda>>, None), u'Lens Model': (<function parse_exif_string>, None), u'DNG Lens Info': (<function parse_exif_string>, None), u'Forward Matrix 2': (<function <lambda>>, u'1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1'), u'Forward Matrix 1': (<function <lambda>>, u'1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1'), u'CFA Pattern 2': (<function <lambda>>, None), u'Black Level Repeat Dim': (<function <lambda>>, None), u'Baseline Noise': (<function <lambda>>, None), u'CFA Plane Color': (<function <lambda>>, None), u'Focal Length': (<function parse_exif_numeric>, None), u'As Shot Neutral': (<function <lambda>>, u'1 1 1'), u'Camera Calibration Sig': (<function parse_exif_string>, None), u'Camera Serial Number': (<function parse_exif_string>, None), u'Orientation': (<function <lambda>>, None), u'Exposure Time': (<function parse_exif_numeric>, None), u'Calibration Illuminant 1': (<function <lambda>>, 17), u'Calibration Illuminant 2': (<function <lambda>>, 21), u'Reduction Matrix 1': (<function <lambda>>, u'1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1'), u'Reduction Matrix 2': (<function <lambda>>, u'1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1'), u'Camera Model Name': (<function parse_exif_string>, None), u'Color Matrix 2': (<function <lambda>>, u'1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1'), u'Analog Balance': (<function <lambda>>, u'1 1 1'), u'Color Matrix 1': (<function <lambda>>, u'1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1')})}))[source]¶

Reads given dng files exif tags using given binding.

Parameters:
  • dng_files (array_like) – dng files to read the exif tags from.
  • exif_tags_binding (dict_like) – Exif tags binding.
Returns:

dng files exif tags.
Return type:

list
